location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘COPY FROM A TRACING OF A PORTION OF THE CHART OF THE SHATT EL ARAB – MAGHIL TO BASRA, SUPPLIED BY LIEUTENANT-COMMANDER CAMPBELL OF THE R.I.M.S. “COMET”.’

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Title continues: ‘ON WHICH I HAVE MARKED THE BAGDAD RAILWAY MATERIAL DEPÔT IN RED INK’. Rough plan showing Basra and environs with the location of German Depot and Customs indicated. British Consulate’s coordinates reported.In the bottom left-hand corner printed: ‘S.D.O. No. 605. Dec. 1912’.
